name: @fast-check/poisoning
description: Set of utilities to ease detection and revert of poisoning

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json --incremental && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json --incremental --module es2015 --moduleResolution node --outDir lib/esm && cp package.esm-template.json lib/esm/package.json
scripts.build-ci: tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.json --module es2015 --moduleResolution node --outDir lib/esm && cp package.esm-template.json lib/esm/package.json

author: Nicolas DUBIEN <github@dubien.org>
